item.title: Broadcom shares rise as AI growth powers strong guidance
item.description: Broadcom shares rallied after the company posted strong first-quarter earnings and guidance and signaled ongoing AI demand.

item.title: Broadcom's report gives the battered AI trade a much-needed win
item.description: The chipmaker delivered the kind of quarterly beats and strong guidance needed to ease investor fears.

item.title: Costco checks plenty of key boxes for investors despite missing on earnings
item.description: Nothing in the numbers or what was said on Thursday's conference call suggests the best-of-breed retailer has lost a step.

item.title: Broadcom shares soar 16% as earnings top estimates on demand for custom AI chips
item.description: Broadom reported earnings and revenue that topped analysts' expectations.

item.title: Costco reports mixed second-quarter earnings, comparable sales growth
item.description: Costco on Thursday reported mixed earnings for the fourth quarter.
